title: Bonded by Sin
description: Daryn Carter is the product of a married man, her mother is the product of a married man, and her grandmother is the product of a married man. She has vowed not to carry on the same tradition as her mother and grandmother. She has been successful at dodging the bloodline curse until she meets Logan Anderson.  It was unintentional, but fated as her destiny, due to her bloodline to be involved with a married man as well. Will Daryn Carter have the strength to evade the bloodline curse of her grandmother and mother, or will she succumb to the reality of you canâ€™t escape your fate.
author: Sarah Mc White
